CustomField.description: Sets the Conga Template Category for SoW Templates based on EMPAUA Entity.
CustomField.formula: CASE( DeliveringEntityRef__r.CompanyNameExternal__c , 'EMPAUA Ltd.','UK', 'EMPAUA GmbH','DE', 'EMPAUA GmbH (CH)','CH', '' ) &" "& CASE( ProjectType__c , 'Maintenance','Managed Service', 'Managed Services','Managed Service', '' ) &" "& CASE( SoWLanguage__c , 'German','German', 'English','English', 'English' )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sets the Conga Template Category for SoW Templates based on EMPAUA Entity.
CustomField.label: SoW Conga Template Group
